name: PlaygroundRemoteLiveViewProxy
desc: A proxy that facilitates message passing between the always-on live view and its corresponding playground page.

items.name: func send(PlaygroundValue)
items.desc: Sends a message to the always-on live view.

items.name: var delegate: PlaygroundRemoteLiveViewProxyDelegate?
items.desc: A delegate you use to handle messages from the live view.

items.name: func receive(PlaygroundValue)
items.desc: Allows the proxy to receive a live view message from a remote object.

items.name: func liveViewMessageConnectionOpened()
items.desc: Informs the proxy that it has connected to a remote object.

items.name: func liveViewMessageConnectionClosed()
items.desc: Informs the proxy that the connection between the proxy and the remote object was closed.
